Jensen JTV1921DC 19″ LED HD TV with Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner, 16:9 LCD Panel, 1366 x 768, 12VDC, 16.7 Million Colors, White LED Illumination, 250 nit Brightness, 9ms Response Time

Jensen made just what you need to upgrade your mobile lounge. This 19″ LED HD TV runs off 12-volt power, giving you a sleek and tidy addition to your boat, RV, custom SUV, or limousine. With plenty of diverse inputs and HD capability, this screen will make the most out of anything you connect to it, whether it’s a Blu-ray player or gaming console. You can wall-mount this monitor, and the built-in speakers will broadcast strong stereo sound. The included remote control lets you control the screen and access the menu

Key Features:
– White LED Illumination
– 16:9 LCD panel, 1366 x 768 FULL HD
– DC Power
– Integrated HDTV (ATSC) Tuner
– Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI
– CEC function with JENSEN CEC-equipped HDMI DVD players
– 16.7 Million Colors

Inputs/Outputs:
– Composite Video Input x 1 (NTSC/PAL compatible)
– Component Video Input x 1 (YPbPr) (Note: Composite/component input shares same I/O)
– Stereo Audio Input x 1
– RF x 1
– USB x 1
– HDMI input x 1
– Selectable (Variable/Fixed) Line Level Audio Output (RCA) x 1
– Digital SPDIF Audio Output (RCA) x 1

Specifications:
– Power System: DC 12 V
– Power Consumption: 20mA stand by/3.17A max
– Maximum Relative Humidity: 85%
– Video / Display System: NTSC/ATSC/PAL
– Video Input Signal (Composite): 1Vp-p @ 75 ohms
– Audio Output: 3W x 2
– Diagonal Size: 18.5″
– Resolution: 1366 x 768
– Brightness: 250 nit
– Contrast Ratio: 3000 : 1
– Display Format: 16:9
– Response Time: 9 ms
– Regulatory Certification(s): FCC
– Overall Dimensions: 17.44″ W x 10.97″ H x 1.84″ D (without stand)
– Product Weight: 5.5 Pounds
DC Power
Audio Return Channel (ARC) Supported with HDMI

item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:32:18 UTC – Details)



1【16 Color Sunset Light & 4 Flashing Modes】The sunset lamp projector build-in RGB led, 16 kinds of light effect and 4 dynamic modes(Flash/Strobe/Fade/Smooth Effect) to choose from, provides a comfortable and romantic atmosphere. There are so many choice, you would find one you like.Suitable for children’s rooms, bedrooms, creating a different sunset projector light atmosphere, let you enjoy your leisure time and your family.
2【Smart APP and Remote Control Sunset Lamp】This is a smart sunlight lamp, you can change color of light, adjust brightness of lamp, choose light mode of this sunset lamp projector to make it become a party light or night light through APP on the phone or the remote control; Super convenient and versatile!
3【Portable size Rotatable and Adjustable】The lamp tripod can be rotated and adjusted.The Sunset Lamp head can be rotated 360 degrees, By changing the rotation angle and distance of the illuminator, different circular lights can be emitted from different angles, thereby bringing different effects. The farther the distance is, the larger the projection projected on the wall or ceiling.
4【Widely USE】It is very suitable for use as a background for photos, live broadcast and Vlog video shooting, as well as decoration for bedrooms, living rooms, corridors, cafes, studios, theme restaurants, bars, etc. At the same time, it is also very suitable for occasions such as dating, marriage proposal, parties, birthdays, family celebrations, garden parties and so on.
5 【365 DayQuality Assurance】If you are not 100% satisfied with sunset lights, just contact us and we will refund or replace your product immediately. If you have any questions about our sunlamp, please contact us first, and our support team will try to help you solve all problems…

Product Description

COLOR
Multi Color White Blue Colorful White Red

Super Easy to Install

The car interior lights are pre-installed with optical fibers, which can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple.

High Quality LED Strip

Our car led lights are bright, waterproof and anti-collision. High-brightness led strip lights, lighting is more uniform. The colors and light effects are brighter.

Music Sync

The control button of the interior car lights can switch between different lighting modes with one key control. The controller has a built-in high-sensitivity microphone, which allows the interior lights to change with the rhythm of your favorite songs.

Car Decoration

With this interior light, you won’t get bored while driving. The lights of the light bar can dance with the music, as if you are in a fairy tale world, surrounded by “rainbow”, and accompany you through the long road.

Decorate Your Room

Our led strip lights are romantic creators, with soft and gorgeous lighting adding mood. Allows you to relax your mind while staying in your room.

For Family and Friends

The colorful lights of the LED strips create an exclusive party space for you, allowing you to have a party with your family and friends at any time. Create colorful life

【2022 Upgraded Version,Super Easy to Install】：The optical fiber of interior car lights has been pre-installed, and it can be directly inserted into the gap of the center console, and the operation is simple. Car led lights with USB plugs, plug and play, save more time. Suitable for RVs, camping cars, trailers, cars, trucks, SUVs, ATVs, boats, golf carts, etc.
【Sensitive Music Sensor】: The interior car lights system is equipped with a sound sensor to synchronize the car led lights with the music beat. The LED light strips will automatically change with the rhythm of music or sound to enhance your driving pleasure.
【Multiple Modes & 16 Million Colors】: Our car led lights has 3 light flashing modes, rhythm mode, cycle mode and fixed color mode, which can be switched by pressing the remote control button. There are 16 million colors in the luminous car interior lights, and you can adjust the color you like according to your mood or activity.
【2-wire Concealed Design & Safety 】: This led lights for car adopts a convenient, flexible and unique two-in-one design, which makes it easier to hide the thread in the gap, without worrying about exposed wiring or untidy appearance.The interior car lights is DC5v, built-in fuse, with short circuit protection and memory function. It has good waterproof performance and extremely low heat.
【Perfect Gift and Customer Service】: This Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.Our professional customer service team is on call at any time to provide excellent, lightning-fast response to each of your questions.








5 IN 1 Led Car Strip Light

From the brand

Make life better by controlling everything in the palm of your hand. From intuitive lights to automated home devices, our smart products lineup elevates moods, moments, and beyond.

Top-tier quality made accessible for any home.

Smart Devices

For the Planet

Part of our mission is to make homes safer, cozier, and happier to live in. And that includes our biggest home – the planet.

That’s why we’ve made sure every Vont product comes with a link to an online instruction manual, so your devices are always ready to make life easier, right out of the box.

DRIVE IN A GALAXY OF COLOR LIGHTS | CUSTOMIZE YOUR CAR – Choose from 16 million colors and 30 unique scene modes. DIY effects, adjust brightness, and personalize this RGB LED strip to transform your daily drives into vibrant road trips.
QUICK SETUP | EASY CONTROL W/ VONT HOME APP – Just plug it in, power on, and lay out the 21-feet, single-design strip light suitable for various car models. Secure with the cable ties/stickers included and wirelessly control with the app or via a convenient controller.
﻿LIGHTS JAM W/ YOUR FAVORITE BEATS | ENJOY MUSIC MODE – Vont Car Lights built-in mic syncs with your car’s music in real-time, letting you experience a colorful car karaoke with your favorite beats.
﻿SAFE TO USE & WATER-RESISTANT – The interior strip light’s robust built comes with safety features to make you feel extra secure. It’s flame retardant, water-resistant, has a high-temp resistance, and is harmless to kids.
﻿24/7 CUSTOMER CARE & LIFETIME WARRANTY – Covered for life, it’s warranted against loss, theft, and defects in materials and workmanship as long as you own your car lights. Vont Customer Satisfaction Wizards are with you 24/7 – for life.

Next Level Interior Safety

Vont Smart Car Strip Light’s sophisticated engineering makes sure you always feel secure with its safety features. Rated with IP20 (only for indoor use), it’s water-resistant, flame retardant, and super-safe to touch.

Activate Rhythmic Roadtrips

Color lights are one thing, but having lights that dance to the beat of your music is beyond everyday driving. Activate Music Mode and witness your strip lights sync with your car’s music and unbreakable car karaoke.

Four Mighty Light Strips

The single-design build features four strip lights with twelve powerful LEDs per light. Every LED is meticulously designed to bring you high-grade light that when combined, produces its 16 million-color dazzling brilliance – rousing your car to life.

(as of Nov 30,2022 03:04:42 UTC – Details)


Buckle up for an exciting ride through life’s twists and turns. Pop in colorful pegs and spin to move along the gameboard as life unfolds from Start to Retirement. Every Stop! Space is a major life milestone where players spin for their fate or choose their path forward. Decide whether or not to get married, grow a family, or retire early. Action cards give players options for how their adventures play out! Willing to take a risk? Invest in a number on the investment tracker and get more cash whenever someone spins that number. Spend cash wisely because the player with the most money at the end of the game wins! The Game of Life game is a fun thing to do while staying at home and a great indoor game for kids ages 8 and up. It makes an exciting pick for game night or a homeschool activity.

Hasbro Gaming and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc.
Spin to Win is a trademark of The Trustee of the Reuben B. Klamer L.T.
COLORFUL PEGS: Have a colorful ride In this game the pegs come in 6 different colors for players to pop friends and family into their car as they travel around the gameboard
KIDS CAN PICK THEIR OWN PATH: Buckle up and take a spin! In this fun family board game, every crossroad brings exciting twists, turns, and adventures
MAKE CHOICES: Players get to make some big life decisions They can choose whether or not to go to college, to get married, grow their family, or retire early
WILL IT PAY TO INVEST: Players can take a chance to grow their money by investing in numbers on the board Get paid every time someone spins that number
FUN KIDS GAME FOR 2-4 PLAYERS: The Game of Life game is great for parties, game night, or homeschool fun. The game is for 2-4 players and makes an exciting indoor activity for kids ages 8 and up

Read more

The Game of Life

Buckle up for an exciting ride through life’s twists and turns. Pop in colorful pegs and spin to move along the gameboard as life unfolds from Start to Retirement. Every Stop! Space is a major life milestone where players spin for their fate or choose their path forward. Decide whether or not to get married, grow a family, or retire early. Action cards give players options for how their adventures play out! Willing to take a risk? Invest in a number on the investment tracker and get more cash whenever someone spins that number. Spend cash wisely because the player with the most money at the end of the game wins! The Game of Life game is a fun thing to do while staying at home and a great indoor game for kids ages 8 and up. It makes an exciting pick for game night or a homeschool activity.

Read more

Product Features

FUN KIDS GAME FOR 2-4 PLAYERS

The Game of Life game is great for parties, game night, or homeschool fun. The game is for 2-4 players and makes an exciting indoor activity for kids ages 8 and up

KIDS CAN PICK THEIR OWN PATH

Buckle up and take a spin! In this fun family board game, every crossroad brings exciting twists, turns, and adventures

WILL IT PAY TO INVEST?

Players can take a chance to grow their money by investing in numbers on the board! Get paid every time someone spins that number

Look no further than this colorblock parka to keep you warm on cold practice days or in between swim events. Cozy fleece lining and a water-resistant shell make this lightweight, packable style the only outerwear you need. Highlights Cozy fleece lining Water-resistant outer layer Lightweight design 2-way zipper (inside & out) Hooded Outer: 100% Polyester Inner: 100% Polyester Fleece.

YOUR TEAM YOUR COLORS

From diving pairs to racing teams, Speedo team apparel can help you look like a cohesive unit. Show up to competitions with matching or coordinating team swimwear and apparel and you'll look and feel ready to show the other teams who's boss.

Fleece Lined

Fleece lined for extra warmth for those cold morning practices.

Zipper

Two-way zipper on parkas allows one to move more freely. Highest quality zippers are used.

Pockets

Convenient pockets on the front.

Draw String

Easily adjusted for the perfect fit.

With a wide variety of colors, patterns and styles available, you can outfit the whole team to match your team or school.

What the team wears headed onto deck and pool is an important choice, find the perfect color and pattern to represent everyone.

Product Description

Waterproof & Easy to clean up!

We all love our pets, but no one enjoys a messy floor. Hoki found has a solution! We are offering the quality silicone mat to protect your floors! The mat is functional, as well as very visually appealing! And it is very easy to clean up! Throw it in the dishwasher, wash it in the sink, or just hose it off! Give us a try, you’ll be glad you did!

Versatile

Not only bowls, can be used also under pet dringking fountains, automatic feeders,and much more. Please refer to measurements for size.

Useful for a variety of pets

Great for most pets, like dogs, cats and more.
